1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural entrepreneurs, Aries are good at taking calculated risks and adapting to new situations.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Tauruses are practical and detail-oriented, but can be slow to adapt to changes in plans.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Geminis are quick-witted and adaptable, making them naturally good at improvising and adjusting on the fly.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Cancers are empathetic and nurturing, which helps them navigate complex social situations, but they can be overly emotional and rigid.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Leos are confident and charismatic, making them natural performers who excel at adapting to different audiences and situations.
6. Virgo - 4/10 - Virgos are analytical and precise, but can be too focused on details and struggle with adaptability.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Librans are diplomatic and balanced, making them adept at navigating complex social dynamics and adapting to changing circumstances.
8. Scorpio - 6/10 - Scorpios are intense and passionate, which helps them drive through challenges, but they can be too rigid and struggle with adaptability.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Sagittarians are optimistic and adventurous, making them good at taking calculated risks and adapting to new experiences.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Capricorns are disciplined and responsible, which helps them navigate complex situations, but they can be too focused on control and struggle with flexibility.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Aquarians are humanitarian and inventive, making them adept at finding innovative solutions to complex problems and adapting to changing circumstances.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Pisces are empathetic and imaginative, which helps them navigate complex emotional situations, but they can be too dreamy and struggle with adaptability in practical matters.
